Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HeapSnapshotInstance" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HeapSnapshotSequence" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HeapSnapshotBufferLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HeapSnapshotBuffer" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HeapSnapshotBufferLen"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HeapSnapshotInstance" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="TotalData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
